    • Method Detail

      • isValidLink

        public static boolean isValidLink(String url)
        It retrieves the given URL is valid or is not. Valid means that the URL syntax is correct and it can be able to clicked by the correct syntax.
        Parameters:
        url - Any kind of url as a String.
        Returns:
        True when it is valid.

      • isResourceUrl

        public static boolean isResourceUrl(String url)
        It retrieves the given URL is a resource URL or is not. Resource URL means styles, scripts or images.
        Parameters:
        url - Any kind of url as a String.
        Returns:
        True when it is an resource url.
